message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I'm confident you'll love. I'm willing to offer it to you for $15000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10000. Can you consider that?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to compromise and meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12500. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $11000. Can you meet me there?
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'll meet you at $11500. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's a fair compromise. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10800. Can you meet me there?
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $11000. That's the best I can do. What do you think?
I understand that you're getting close to your minimum price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10500. Can you meet me there?
I'm really close to my minimum price, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll meet you at $10700. That's the best I can do. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'd be willing to go up to $10200. Can you meet me there?
